response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted with the highest quality materials, ensuring it exceeds all your requirements. I understand that the true value of this product may be subjective, but based on its unique features and capabilities, we believe it's worth considering an offer of $20,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the innovative technology and craftsmanship that sets it apart. We're confident that you'll find immense value in this product, making it a worthwhile investment for your business or personal use.
